content: What is the likely cause of death of the late, great Matthew Perry?

The Friends star, 49, was rushed to hospital in the US on Thursday after paramedics were called to his home.
His publicist confirmed that Matthew is “under observation at the hospital and is stable” but refused to comment further.
However, the Mirror has reported that Matthew is suffering from symptoms consistent with hepatitis A, a viral infection of the liver that is typically spread by consuming contaminated food or water.
The publication claims the former Chandler Bing actor was “pooing blood” when he was found by paramedics.
The Mirror reports that he is being treated for the disease in hospital.
Hepatitis A is a highly infectious virus that can cause symptoms including fever, nausea, diarrhoea, loss of appetite, and tiredness.
It can also cause jaundice – a yellowing of the skin and eyes.

Matthew Perry was an American actor and comedian, best known for his role as Chandler Bing in the popular TV sitcom, Friends. On November 3rd, 2019, it was announced that he had died in his home in Los Angeles at the age of 49. The official cause of death is still pending, but there are a number of factors that may have contributed to his death.
Perry had struggled with substance abuse for many years and had been open about his addiction to alcohol and prescription painkillers. In 2001, he entered rehab for the first time after he was arrested for possession of heroin. The cause of death is a heart attack. Heart attacks are caused by a blockage of blood flow to the heart. This blockage is usually caused by a buildup of cholesterol and other fatty substances in the arteries.

Matthew Perry was found unresponsive in his home on August 19th, 2019, and was rushed to the hospital, where he was reportedly sedated and placed on a ventilator. A representative for Perry later confirmed that he was recovering from a surgical procedure, but did not provide any details about his condition. There were rumors that Perry had been in a coma, but these were later denied by his representatives.
However, it is important to note that the details of Perry's medical condition and the exact circumstances leading up to his death are still unclear, and the official cause of death has not yet been announced.
